#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

const int maxN = 1e6;
int p[maxN + 10];
long long f[maxN + 10], lcm[maxN + 10];

int main() {
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
        freopen("output.txt", "w", stdout);
    #endif

    for (int i = 2; i * i <= maxN; ++i)
        if (!p[i]) for (int j = i * i; j <= maxN; j += i)
            if (!p[j]) p[j] = i;

    for (int i = 2; i <= maxN; ++i)
        if (!p[i]) p[i] = i;

    f[1] = 1;
    for (int i = 2; i <= maxN; ++i) {
        f[i] = i;
        int d = i;
        while (d > 1) {
            int x = p[d];
            while (d % x == 0) d /= x;
            f[i] -= f[i] / x;
        }
        f[i] = f[i] * i / 2;
    }

    for (int i = 1; i <= maxN; ++i)
        for (int j = 1; j * i <= maxN; ++j)
            lcm[i * j] += (long long )i * j * f[j];

    int TC;
    scanf("%d", &TC);

    while (TC--) {
        int n;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        printf("%lld\n", lcm[n]);
    }
    return 0;
}
